es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.agent.capability.perception
Class ShanksAgentPerceptionCapability

java.lang.Object
  es.upm.dit.gsi.shanks.agent.capability.perception.ShanksAgentPerceptionCapability

public class ShanksAgentPerceptionCapability
extends Object

This class defines the behaviour of an agent that inherits the Perception Capability.

Author:
a.carrera

getRandomObjectLocationInPerceptionRange

public static Location getRandomObjectLocationInPerceptionRange(ShanksSimulation simulation,
                                                                PercipientShanksAgent agent)
Get a random object location in the perception range of the agent.

Parameters:
simulation -
agent -
Returns:
A random object location within the perception range of the agent. This location never will be the location of the agent. If the location is the unique object in the perception range, return null.
